Text:
How to use this as a lag switch for PS3/Xbox360

1- Open it.
2- Click Start in the upper left corner -> Network Tools -> UDP flooder
3- In the IP write 27.27.27.27 instead of 127.0.0.1.
4- Copy this Data and paste it 80 times like this:



5- Set speed to 10.
6- When at the game Start!

NOTE: You must be the host of the lobby for that to work!
